title: BTCHN’ Bikes 4130 Highhh Riser Bars in Pink
content:
Tyler from BTCHN’ Bikes is working on his MADE bike already, and with it came the idea to do his 4130 Highhh Riser bars in bright pink! Well, he made a few extras for anyone bold enough to rock pink bars, and they’re in stock now at the BTCHN web shop.

Specs:

  • $180
  • 75 mm of rise
  • 820 mm, 800 mm, 780 mm, 760 mm wide (and guess what, you can cut it down yourself as narrow as 720 with adequate control room!)
  • 13° or 16° of backsweep
  • 22.2 mm clamp diameter

Check out more at BTCHN Bikes.

The post BTCHN’ Bikes 4130 Highhh Riser Bars in Pink appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
